title: Russian Urals Crude Offered to China at a Discount
summary: Russia’s Urals crude grade, which usually goes from the western Russian ports to India, is now being offered at discounts in China amid uncertainties over Indian purchases of Moscow’s oil following the additional tariffs.
fullContent: Russia’s Urals crude grade, which usually goes from the western Russian ports to India, is now being offered at discounts in China amid uncertainties over Indian purchases of Moscow’s oil following the additional tariffs. Spot Urals shipments going to China would be a significant re-routing of the Russian oil export flows. Prompt Urals cargoes are now being pitched to Chinese buyers, who typically import the Far Eastern Russian grade ESPO. Urals is being offered at a premium of $1.50 over London Brent, down from a $2.50 a barrel…

title: Odd Lots: Mary Daly on Alaska as US Leading Indicator (Podcast)
summary: Alaska is one of the states in the Federal Reserve’s 12th District, which is headquartered in San Francisco. For Mary Daly, the president of the SF Fed, the state right now is a leading indicator for the US economy overall.
fullContent: Alaska is one of the states in the Federal Reserve’s 12th District, which is headquartered in San Francisco. For Mary Daly, the president of the SF Fed, the state right now is a leading indicator for the US economy overall. In an interview recorded on a Fed tour in Anchorage, Daly tells us what she’s learning from businesses in the state, how it relates to the rest of the US economy, and how she uses what she’s learning on the ground in order to best guide monetary policy. We also get her big pi

title: Info Edge Q1 Results: Cons PAT jumps 27% YoY to Rs 296 crore, revenue up 17%
summary: Info Edge (India) reported a 27% year-on-year increase in consolidated net profit for the June quarter, reaching Rs 296 crore. Revenue also saw a 17% rise to Rs 791 crore. Standalone billings grew by 11.2%, with recruitment business increasing by 9.
fullContent: Info Edge (India) reported a 27% year-on-year increase in consolidated net profit for the June quarter, reaching Rs 296 crore. Revenue also saw a 17% rise to Rs 791 crore. Standalone billings grew by 11.2%, with recruitment business increasing by 9.0% and non-recruitment portfolio growing by 17.6%. However, the recruitment segment faced headwinds and a sectoral slowdown.

title: The pirate flag from anime ‘One Piece’ is Indonesia’s newest protest symbol—and officials are cracking down
summary: Officials warn the "provocation"—seen as a protest against President Prabowo's policies—should not fly alongside the country's red-and-white flag.
fullContent: Officials warn the "provocation"—seen as a protest against President Prabowo's policies—should not fly alongside the country's red-and-white flag.
